meta.description: Optimize the network of a futuristic transportation system interconnecting 7 strategic hubs to maximize vehicle dispatch from Hub 0 to Hub 6.

sets.name: HUBS
sets.description: Strategic hubs in the transportation network

params.name: capacity
params.description: Maximum number of vehicles that can move between hubs per hour

objective.name: max_dispatch_to_hub_6
objective.description: Maximize the number of vehicles dispatched from Hub 0 to Hub 6

constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from Hub 0 to Hub 1
